title: This $25.99 charging station supports four devices at once
description:
These days, we all have so many devices, it can be hard to stay organized. It’s even harder when you’re trying to charge multiple devices at once and have wires spiraling all over the place. That’s why this 4-in-1 30W Charging Station for Multiple Devices makes such a good addition to your desk.

This compact charging station can charge four devices at once, making it the perfect hub to give all of your devices a boost while you’re working. With a total charging output of 30W, it includes two USB ports, a USB-C p
